results.definition: not large but sufficient in size or amount

examples: a newspaper with a modest circulation

results.definition: low or inferior in station or quality
examples: a modest man of the people

results.definition: humble in spirit or manner; suggesting retiring mildness or even cowed submissiveness
marked by simplicity; having a humble opinion of yourself
examples: too modest to wear his medals

results.definition: not offensive to sexual mores in conduct or appearance
examples: a modest neckline in her dress covered her up to her collarbone
